scripts.build: pnpm run build:js:tauri-commands:cjs && pnpm run build:js:tauri-commands:esm && pnpm run build:js:holochain-env && rollup -c
scripts.build:js:tauri-commands:cjs: tsc guest-js/tauri-commands/*.ts --outDir dist-js/tauri-commands/  --declaration --target es2021 --module commonjs && mv dist-js/tauri-commands/index.js dist-js/tauri-commands/indes.cjs
scripts.build:js:tauri-commands:esm: tsc guest-js/tauri-commands/*.ts --outDir dist-js/tauri-commands/  --declaration --target es2021 --moduleResolution bundler --module esnext
scripts.build:js:holochain-env: tsc guest-js/holochain-env/*.ts --outDir dist-js-tmp/holochain-env/ --target es2021 --moduleResolution bundler --module esnext --skipLibCheck true
scripts.build:js:app-setup: tsc guest-js/app-setup/*.ts --outDir dist-js-tmp/app-setup/ --target es2021 --moduleResolution bundler --module esnext --skipLibCheck true
